attributes.action: Have a full, thorogh, open, national enquiry into the child grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The standing government have denied a National enquiry. Why would any caring government deny this? Mistakes can be highlighted and protocols implemented to ensure no other young girls are groomed, raped or murdered.
attributes.background: The signees of this petition demand a full, thorogh, open, National enquiry into the child grooming gangs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
